roleset.name: cause a change in something
roleset.note: METABOLIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'metabolize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from metabolize.01-v predicate notes)
METABOLISM-N NOTES: Based on Temprel data. Comparison to metabolize.01. No VN class. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from metabolism.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The drug, discovered in 1984,]-1 is metabolized [*-1]from soil fungus found in Japan.
example.arg: from soil fungus found in Japan

example.name: Note that there is an enzyme implied here to metabolize, which is why 'in the liver' is a location
